title: Influence on outcome of Congressional election

content.question: Which of the following has the most influence on the outcome of a congressional election?

choices.label: Local performance of a candidate's party in the presidential race
The amount of a candidate's campaign spending relative to that of his or her opponent
The level of support from local party leaders

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
